comment: Of the 4.75 million Palestinians living under Israeli military rule without voting rights, 320,000 live in occupied E Jerusalem, 2.8 million in West Bank, and 1.8 million in Gaza.

comment: @FleurHassanN @ArielElyseGold The 4.75m Arabs u mention are not under Israeli military rule.
